sentence.Network_en: "I have never knowingly exposed any patient to needless risks," he said.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说：“我从未故意将任何病人置于不必要的风险境地。”

sentence.Network_cn: 他再三强调自己从没有故意吸毒。

sentence.Network_cn: 这家公司一直否认自己是有意违反武器禁运规定。

entry.def: If you knowingly do something wrong, you do it even though you know it is wrong.

example.ex: He repeated that he had never knowingly taken illegal drugs.
example.tran: 他再三强调自己从没有故意吸毒。
